info.name: IntraVox
info.description:
IntraVox brings SharePoint-style page creation to Nextcloud with a powerful drag-and-drop interface.
**Features:** * Create rich, interactive pages with a visual editor * Flexible grid layout system (1-5 columns) * Drag-and-drop widget placement * Multiple widget types: text, images, headings, links, files * Secure JSON-based storage preventing code injection * Integration with Nextcloud Files * Top navigation bar button for easy access * Default homepage for quick start
**Perfect for:** * Company intranets and knowledge bases * Team collaboration spaces * Internal documentation and wikis * SharePoint migrations to Nextcloud
Built with Vue 3 and modern web technologies for a smooth, secure experience.
info.author: Rik Dekker
